Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ChangesHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ChangesHandler
public class ChangesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Class which handles Model changes, publishing them to its subscribed RemoteView and writing them to disk when needed. The "read" methods read the wanted information from a game specific folder and return it to the caller. They are used in Game initialization to satisfy the persistency requirement. Every publish method forwards the passed Model to the listening RemoteView by creating an instance of a Renderable subclass. Every write method adds the passed parameter to a writing queue which gets flushed only when an action is completed. This approach has been chosen in order to save to disk only Model states that contain completed actions.

      Creates fresh game files which will be used to instantiate all Model related Objects.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - each entry will be used to create a personal folder
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown when something goes wrong in folders copying.

    • publishPlayer

      public void publishPlayer​(Player player)
      Publishes Player instance. The corresponding Client will receive an update containing all its information, while the other players will receive a slimmer version, not containing private information.
      Parameters:
      player - updated Player object.
